item.title: Alec Baldwin to Host ‘The Ides of April’ Audio Drama
item.description: Alec Baldwin is making his return to narrative audio with “The Ides of April,” an 8-episode historical docuseries chronicling the pivotal 17 days in April 1865 — from the surrender at Appo
